2010 to Present Migrated databases from SQL Server 2005 to SQL Server 2008 using SSIS Linked Server and Bulk Insert Participated in the data warehousing of major deployment and Migration projects Coordinated physical changes and performance monitoring of two replicated production servers one development server and one reporting server all Microsoft SQL Server 20052008 Helped developers tune queries assigned proper indexes and aided developers in the creation of triggers and stored procedures Showed the developers how to use and take advantage of the SQL Server Index Tuning Wizard and the SQL Server Profiler Experience managing multiterabyte production of both STANDBY and CLUSTERED systems using ACTIVEPASSIVE Clustering Applied Service Packs to SQL Server 2005 and 2008 for updates and security Established naming conventions and standards for the SQL Server and databases and made sure that everyone stuck to them Established standards and schedules for database backups by making sure that the backup schedules meet the recovery requirements on a daily weekly and monthly basis Used the RESTORE VERIFY option when creating backups Developed recovery procedures for each database Performed Administration tasks Replication Tuning Configuration and troubleshooting on SQL Server 20052008 Established and enforced all database standards Analyzed all informational requirements of new or production systems and develops database specifications Maintained the proper use of storage space requirements and adding new storage space disk drives when required Responsible for installing SQL Server and upgrading an existing SQL Server and ensuring the success of the upgrade Responsible for importing and exporting data to and from the SQL Server using BCP DTS and SSIS Worked as a team member with other DBAs to ensure 24 x 7 production support of all corporate databases Performed backups of all SQL servers 20002005 daily weekly and monthly Ensured security of the database servers by implementing applicable security patches and maintaining appropriate security measures Migrated MySQL databases to SQL server 2005 using SQL SERVER Migration Assistance 40 Experience in creating monitoring and backup recovering and tuning SQL Server databases in a multi platform environment Monitored and maintained database performance and identifiedrecommended areas that can be improved Managed and executed maintenance jobs that ensured the stability and performance of the database servers Education Bachelor of Business Administration in Management Georgia State University Atlanta Atlanta GA August 2004 Additional Information TECHNICAL SKILLS Experience with SQL SERVER 2005 and 2008R2 Primary and Standby databases Experience with implementation of backup and recovery in SQL SERVER Experience using Data Collection Performance Monitor Extended Events to manage CPUMemory resources in an environment of multiple instances of SQL Server Proficient in copying and migrating SQL SERVER 20052008 databases Used Query Analyzer and SQL Server Profiler to tune SQL SERVER 20052008 databases Expertise in Production support of 10 SQL Server 2005 and 2008 instances running on Windows 20032008 Servers Experience in operating 24x7 monitoring maintenance and troubleshooting Experience with SQL Server database automation tasks using SQL Server Agent and visual basic script Extensive knowledge in Microsoft SQL Server databases as well as SSIS SSRS TSQL and performance tuning Experience with large volume data extraction transformation and loading ETL logic and tools Experience with crossplatform database migration and database instance consolidation Experience with database upgrades and applying hotfixes and patches Experience in creating monitoring backup recovery and tuning SQL Server 2005 and 2008 databases in a multiplatform environment PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES SQL TSQL HTML ASPNET RDBMS MS SQL Server 20052008 MS Access OPERATING SYSTEMS Windows 20032008XP Windows 7
